Alien - Class in lifeform
 
Alien(String, int) - Constructor for class lifeform.Alien
Aliens recreated with a RecoveryBehavior are RecoveryNone by default Aliens have an attack strength of 10, by default Aliens have a recovery Rate of 0 (will never recover) by default
Alien(String, int, RecoveryBehavior) - Constructor for class lifeform.Alien
Aliens have an attack strength of 10, by default Aliens have a recovery Rate of 0 (will never recover) by default
Alien(String, int, RecoveryBehavior, int) - Constructor for class lifeform.Alien
Aliens have an attack strength of 10, by default
Attachment - Class in weapon
 
Attachment() - Constructor for class weapon.Attachment
 
AttachmentException - Exception in exceptions
 
AttachmentException(String) - Constructor for exception exceptions.AttachmentException
 
attack(LifeForm, int) - Method in class lifeform.LifeForm
attack another Lifeform with full attack strength if the attacker has a weapon with ammo, the weapon will be used if the attacker has no weapon or the weapon is out of ammo, the ranged touch attack (hand to hand attack strength) will be used ranged touch attack will only work within a distance less than or equal to 5 weapon attacks will work only within the range of the weapon used
attackStrength - Variable in class lifeform.LifeForm

F

fire(int) - Method in class weapon.Attachment
Most attachments will change the damage the weapon does when it fires
fire(int) - Method in class weapon.ChainGun
a ChainGun's damage increases the farther away the target is (as long as it is in range)
fire(int) - Method in class weapon.GenericWeapon
fire at a target that is some distance away.
fire(int) - Method in class weapon.Pistol
 
fire(int) - Method in class weapon.PlasmaCannon
a Plasma Cannonc's damage decreases with each shot fired
fire(int) - Method in class weapon.PowerBooster
 
fire(int) - Method in class weapon.Scope
Scopes increase the maxRange of the base Weapon, which may or may not be used to calculate its damage Scopes also increase a weapon's power ScopeDamage = BaseDamage*((maxRange - distance)/maxRange)
fire(int) - Method in class weapon.Stabilizer
A Stabilizer auto reloads if ammo is at 0 after firing A Stabilizer also increases the Weapon's damage by 25%
fire(int) - Method in interface weapon.Weapon
Fire the weapon once, this reduces the current ammo by one bullet
